actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

official_title: Expressing support for the designation of September 23, 2025, as "Mary Church Terrell Day", and calling on Congress to recognize Mary Church Terrell's lasting contributions to the civil rights and women's rights movements.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues
subjects_top_term: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues
